channel.title: create on Blockchain Daily
channel.description: Recent content in create on Blockchain Daily

item.title: Crypto Update NEWS 2022-03-16
item.description: Bored Ape startup plans virtual land sales, APECoin token to kickstart metaverse gaming project (3 minute read) Yuga Labs is planning to build a gaming-focused metaverse called MetaRPG that will be compatible with a host of NFTs.

item.title: Crypto Update NEWS 2022-03-14
item.description: Bored Ape Yacht Club creator buys CryptoPunks and Meebits (4 minute read) Yuga Labs, the creator of Bored Ape Yacht Club, has acquired CryptoPunks and Meebits from Larva Labs for an unknown sum.

item.title: Crypto Update NEWS 2022-01-21
item.description: Facebook and Instagram will reportedly become major NFT marketplaces (8 minute read) Meta is preparing tools for creating and distributing non-fungible tokens (NFTs).
